snippet: Walt Disney Co expects global retail sales from its 10-month-old Infinity video game to reach $1 billion even as rivals also combine physical toys with video games, Jimmy Pitaro, president of the company's interactive unit, said in an interview....

headline.print_headline: Disney Sees Infinity Game's Retail Sales Hitting $1 Billion
headline.main: Disney Sees Infinity Game's Retail Sales Hitting $1 Billion

lead_paragraph: Walt Disney Co expects global retail sales from its 10-month-old Infinity video game to reach $1 billion even as rivals also combine physical toys with video games, Jimmy Pitaro, president of the company's interactive unit, said in an interview.
